thread.title: Victor Garber on ‘Hello Dolly!’ and His Start in New York Theater

author: Barbara Chai
title: Victor Garber on ‘Hello Dolly!’ and His Start in New York Theater
text:
For the first five performances of “Hello Dolly!,” Victor Garber was terrified.
“I thought, ‘Oh my god, I don’t know if I can do this. It’s been a long time,’ ” says the veteran, Canadian-born actor. He felt like a deer caught in headlights on stage.
Mr. Garber is back on Broadway after eight years focused on television and film, and despite... To Read the Full Story Subscribe Sign In
